description: With Cremo Beard and Scruff Softener, you're only 30 seconds away from a significantly softened and deep-conditioned beard. Most hair conditioners require 2-3 minutes of application as they coat hair with silicone to make it seem softer. But silicone residue blocks absorption of the beneficial ingredients that hair needs for health and softness. Cremo's formula features powerful moisturizers and beard-specific conditioners that penetrate coarse facial hair to soften from the inside, giving you -and those close to you- an astonishingly superior feel. Softens and conditions facial hair of any length or type. Reduces beard itch and replenishes moisture. Enhances shine and appearance. Keeps beard smelling fresh and looking healthy

description:
One hard-working, scurvy-fighting son of a gun! While you're hard at work, dirt and grime flock to your face like hipsters to a vegan coffee shop with free wi-fi. That's why Duke Cannon created a face wash that works as hard as you do. Formulated to ward off the effects of double shifts, blistering winds, and bacon grease, it has a refreshing citrus scent and a little grit for optimal cleansing.
Made with premium ingredients:
- Menthol to energize
- Jojoba for outer layer protection
- Vitamin C to fight fatigue and scurvy (yes, scurvy - it's a real threat that other products seem to ignore)
title: Duke Cannon Working Man's Face Wash - 4oz

bullets: 4oz. tube complete with heavy duty, no-leak cap
Made with Vitamin C, Menthol & Jojoba
Refreshing citrus scent and a little grit for optimal cleansing.
Made in the USA and a portion of proceeds benefits US Veterans

description: At .56 oz, Cannon Balm is nearly 4x the size of the stuff they sell in grocery store check-out lanes. It's made of premium, natural and organic ingredients and formulated with SPF 15 to protect against UV rays. Tested by active duty military personnel, the unique formulation holds up in the harshest conditions, even withstanding 125 degree temperatures. Has a fresh mint taste that appeals to men, not teenage girls. Upgrade to the Lip Balm that's as wide as a screwdriver handle. Repair and defend with Cannon Balm.

bullets: Offensively large - .56 oz.

The face wash has been formulated to leave skin clear and clean, simply lather up on wet skin and rinse. The scrub gently exfoliates and cleanses the skin, whilst the moisturizer has been specially formulated to hydrate the skin without leaving skin greasy of sticky.

description:
Clay and dirt spend a lot of time together in the Earth's crust hanging out and mingling with dinosaur bones. The clay in this refreshing wash is driven to reunite itself with the dirt in your face. Cooling Clay Facial Wash by Blackwood For Men is made with Tanakura Clay, famous in Japan for attracting and absorbing dirt while simultaneously moisturizing and exfoliating. With Activated Charcoal to safely draw out toxins, and Lauric Acid to fight aging and sun damage. Paraben-free, phthalate-free, and cruelty-free.
Don't let the Clay in the name fool you - this is not a mask. It's just a powerful facial cleanser that dudes can use every day to look and feel their best.
title: Blackwood for Men Cooling Clay Facial Wash - 4.23 fl oz
